data.title: Wonderful, eclectic gallery
data.text: Features excellent local artists, ceramicists, artisans. It is always fun to visit this gallery. The curator has a great eye for its collection, something for everyone's taste.

data.title: Great place with a wide variety of art.
data.text:
This is more than just a gallery. They have a wide variety of small and affordable items, such as stationary, jewelry, fiber art and small framed art.  The couple who own Toucan show a variety of local Montana artists work and are very knowledgeable about the art scene in Billings.  They also can frame art work and we have used them and are very satisfied.

The place is located on Montana Ave, an area to visit that also has many places to get a bite to eat.

data.title: Affordable little pieces of art in a welcoming artistic environment
data.text: Very welcoming place, with many unique pieces of art, where one could spend hours looking and choosing. Loved everything there. Great gallery off the main track. If you visit Billings, don't miss it.

data.title: Great Gallery
data.text: Visited for the first time today.  Really enjoyed the variety of art work.  Would definitely visit again when and if I'm  in the area.

data.title: Beautiful Art Works
data.text: Once every two months Billings has An Art Walk with almost 2 dozen places displaying local and area artists work. I've shown my work and so has my wife for we both belong to the Billings Artist Association, also known as the BAA.

data.title: Our favorite gallery in Billings!
data.text: Toucan offers something for everyone:  Original artwork and prints in a variety of media; jewelry; pottery and glassware; scarves and hats.  It is a great place to purchase gifts as well as add to your personal art collection.  Local and regional artists may be found along with some from out of state. The items they offer are all of very good quality. The young couple who own the gallery are very knowledgeable and approachable.  Toucan is also the best shop in town to have your own artwork framed; be aware that "you get what you pay for" and the prices are commensurate with the quality.  We should also note that this business is very community-minded and often makes donations to local charities for fundraising auctions.

data.title: A go-to spot in Billings for art lovers
data.text: Great little gallery featuring an affordably priced range of fine and decorative arts.  Nothing terribly cerebral here, but plenty to delight the eye and improve your surroundings.

data.title: Many different forms of Art represented here.
data.text: This is one of our favorite Galleries in town.  My husband purchased a piece of art for me for my birthday and I visited it again this week and found a few more pieces of art.  There is a wide variety of types of art - pottery, clothing, paintings, jewelry, cards and more.  Something for every price range and interest.  They sometimes have music, coffee and cookies.

data.title: Can't miss gallery!
data.text: I visit Billings from Texas about four times a year to see family.  I never miss going to Toucan Gallery, and I always find something wonderful to buy.  The owners are super friendly and helpful, and the artwork and jewelry are outstanding!

data.title: Affordable original art
data.text: This is a funky and fun gallery with lots of art, pottery, cards, jewelry, a bit of everything. Many emerging and local artists.

data.title: Searcing for art
data.text: I like the feel of this gallery.  I like the artwork forsale too. It seems really empty though. Not much to choose from. I asked if they usually have more and the gal said no.
